## ExpandoProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ExpandoProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [defaultExpanded?](./components.expandoprops.defaultexpanded.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether to expand the container by default. |
|  [iconButtonProps?](./components.expandoprops.iconbuttonprops.md) |  | IButtonProps | <i>(Optional)</i> Props to customize the open/close chevron. Note that the default switches the orientation of the chevron, overriding these will lose that state switch. |
|  [label](./components.expandoprops.label.md) |  | string | Toggle link label text. |
|  [linkProps?](./components.expandoprops.linkprops.md) |  | ILinkProps | <i>(Optional)</i> Custom props for the link label. |
|  [styles?](./components.expandoprops.styles.md) |  | [ExpandoStyles](./components.expandostyles.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Custom styles for the component. |
